DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare intra-ocular ( IOP ) control efficacy brimonidine 0.1 % vs. 0.2 % laser peripheral iridotomy ( LPI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Intraocular Pressure Control After Anterior Segment Laser - Comparison Between 2 Drugs
DOC.detailed_description: Postoperative IOP elevation one common complication LPI.Previous study show brimonidine 0.2 % effective blunting IOP spike LPI.This prospective randomize double-masked interventional study include patient bilateral narrow angle , define irido-trabecular contact > 180o gonioscopy.Pilocarpine 1 % use eye , 30 minute later , brimonidine 0.1 % randomly use one eye brimonidine 0.2 % contra-lateral eye . LPI Nd : YAG laser perform 30 minute later eye single glaucoma specialist . IOP measurement assess use eyedrop ( basal IOP ) , 30 minute pilocarpine ( pre-brimonidine ) , 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 minute LPI . Pachymetry , ultrasonic biometry , gonioscopy , total YAG laser energy record . Non-parametric test use analysis .
